headline: Aptiv Refocuses On Intelligent Systems As EDS Spin Off Reshapes Exposure
summary: Aptiv (NYSE:APTV) plans to spin off its Electrical Distribution Systems (EDS) business into a separate company. The move is intended to narrow Aptiv’s focus to intelligent systems and interconnect technologies across automotive and non-automotive markets. Management is pairing the EDS separation with an emphasis on software, mergers and acquisitions, and growth in Asia-Pacific.
